item.title: Tables in tooltips
item.description: With interactive communications, we frequently encourage the graphic to provide some form of overview, and use interactions for adding details on demand. For these details, tables provide a flexible way to organize the information. And we can link the view of such tables to user actions like a pointer hover event where the table of details is in a tooltip. In this tutorial, we construct an html table for our tooltip so that we can organize lots of details on demand.
